__e: You got my cell phone number, my wife's name!
I thought that maybe you'd know some way of getting the medicine for less.
But you certainly knew hers,didn't you?
How well did you know Mum?
Better with you here, since you knew mama, you know?
You said you didn't know his true nature.
Find anybody you know? There must be some kids you know from school.
Oh, honey, you didn't even know me when you knew me.
So a woman showed up to your house for sex and you barely knew her?
So why did you lie to us about how well you knew her?
You knew my father well What would he have done in my place?
Maybe he had a hot date or maybe you didn't know him as well as you think you did.
And how exactly did you know my father?
Who knew my father when he was young.
You knew my uncle back when you were... alive before.
You said you knew my brother?
I delivered the ticket because you knew my brother.
- I mean, you didn't know my mom before.
But apparently you knew my daughter better than I did, so...
And that you knew my mom when she was a girl.
